name: 安东尼·克拉姆
name_full: 安东尼·克拉姆 Anthony Crum

last_movies.title: 指环王：力量之戒 第一季

introduction: Hailing from Whangarei, Anthony Crum is an actor and stand up comedian based in Auckland New Zealand.Anthony starred in the short film 'FOAM' (2019) and the 2020 TV series 'The Wilds'. On stage he's tread the boards as The Beauxhomme in 'Once on this Island', The Bürgermeister in 'The Visit', and Caliban in Shakespeare's 'The Tempest'.Anthony began acting when he was 15 playing 'The Third Witch' in a comedic rewrite of Shakespeares 'Macbeth' by Robert Pollock. He went on to train at The John Bolton Theatre school in 2014 where he developed skills in Clown and Melo-drama. In 2018 Anthony graduated Toi Whakaari New Zealand Drama School with a Bachelor of Performing Arts and in his final year starred as Isaac in the short film 'Hush' which featured in the 2019 Berlin Film Festival.In his spare time Anthony enjoys practicing Improv, watching theatre and writing and performing stand-up comedy. Anthony was a finalist in the New Zealand 2020 Raw Comedy Quest and performs regularly at New Zealands premier comedy club - The Classic Comedy Bar and around the Auckland comedy circuit.
